page.title: 11TRADE
page.content: In Steeple Ashton there are two general shops, one of which is a sub post office.These shops are small and employ only one or two people in addition to the owners.There is also a butcher who, in addition to a round, opens a few times each week.There is one shop in Keevil but not in the area covered by this survey. In Steeple Ashton there is a pub;Great Hinton also has a pub which also serves meals,there is no pub in Keevil. Several people are self employed and carry out their jobs locally; e.g. hairdressing:several hairdressers do home visits but hve no premises of their own. There are some builders,painters and decorators,plumbers,window cleaners, etc,mainly one man businesses.
